de.fu_berlin.maniac.network_manager

Class NetworkManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • de.fu_berlin.maniac.network_manager.NetworkManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class NetworkManager
extends java.lang.Thread
    The NetworkManager is declared and started with the start of the app (Mothership) and runs concurrently. The NetworkManager inherits methods for detection, establishes and managing the connection with the backbone.
    Author:
    maniacchallenge

      • getMyOwnBackbone

        public java.net.InetAddress getMyOwnBackbone()
        Method returns the personal backbone, to which the device is actually connected.
        Returns:
        InetAddress of own connected backbone. If there is no connection, the object is NULL
